description_short: An innovative info-security company providing breakthrough technologies in secure communication applications.  Founded in 2014, the company has created two patents and won many startup competitions.
description: Sixscape is a infosecurity software vendor which focus on authentication and secure End2End communication solutions using Public Key Infrastructure (PKI). We provide an on-premise security platform called IDCentral which make security simple to use and more secure.  Due to manual processes involve in installing and renewing digital certs, apps using PKI did  not go as far as it should.To address this, Sixscape created a new certificate management protocol called Identity Registration Protocol (IRP), which simplify the issuing and renewing of digital certs. The Internet Assign Number Authority (IANA) has reviewed and confirm this protocol is unique and have assigned Internet Application Port#4604 for the use of IRP. Our security platform make is easy to automate cert management when used with our client apps.  IDCentral is not only a full functional Certificate Authority (CA) application, it also enable cert management and has a built-in dynamic IP address Registry which enable mobile End2End direct communications.Our solution consist of our server application called IDCentral, and our client apps which provide seamless cert management between the server application and user apps.  These client apps include secure email, secure chat, secure file transfer, document signing, secure document delivery, …etc., which uses the digital identity assigned to the user with a one single platform.When using our Blackbird secure email app, user make use of the apps to request for a digital cert from the server.  Once registration is completed, user can download the cert into the device and start using the apps without the need to install the cert.  Using IRP, cert management is automated and make it scalable to use PKI in a large scale network such a IoT Networks and Smart Nations.Sixscape Secure Chat apps enable truly End2End direct secure communications by using digital certs, both for authentication and encryption of traffic over IPv4/IPv6 Internets.
